item.title: Projects
item.description: Ascent - 2017 As a programming project for school I wrote this little inspired clone in C++ with the help of SDL2. It’s a fairly simple project but has some nice litte quirks. All art (level geometry, enemy ships, even the UI) is procedurally generated, a custom 3D A* algorithm was used to connect the rooms with tunnels for the endless levels, and OpenGL 4.3 is heavily underutilized for the few particle systems that run in compute.

item.title: Shorts
item.description: Heat - 2014 Two robbers are looking for the loot, and they won’t leave without it! Rushed - 2013 Expecting uninvited visitors, Julia desperately needs to get home on time and get ready before they arrive to find the apartment in a gruesome state.
